title: _DISPLAY_HUD_WHEN_DEAD_THIS_FRAME
content:
0x7669F9E39DC170630xC380AC85// DisplayHudWhenDeadThisFrame
void _DISPLAY_HUD_WHEN_DEAD_THIS_FRAME();Enables drawing some hud components, such as help labels, this frame, when the player is dead.Examples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		N_0x7669f9e39dc17063()
		Wait(0)
	end
end)
